questions.question: What is the kinetic diameter of ethylene (C2H4) as mentioned in the text?
What strategy was employed to boost the C2H6/C2H4 separation performance of Tb-MOF-76?
questions.answer: Introduction of amino (NH2) groups into Tb-MOF-76.

questions.question: How does the pore size of Tb-MOF-76(NH2) compare to Tb-MOF-76, and what is its effect on gas adsorption?
questions.answer: The pore size of Tb-MOF-76(NH2) is smaller (7.2 × 7.2 Å2) compared to Tb-MOF-76 (7.9 × 7.9 Å2), which facilitates multiple guest-host interactions in confined pores, improving gas adsorption.

questions.question: Is the C2H6/C2H4 selectivity of Tb-MOF-76(NH2) higher or lower than that of Tb-MOF-76?
questions.answer: Higher, Tb-MOF-76(NH2) has a C2H6/C2H4 selectivity of about 2.1 compared to 1.7 for Tb-MOF-76.

questions.question: Based on the text, which MOF shows a better performance in terms of C2H4 productivity from C2H6/C2H4 mixtures, Tb-MOF-76 or Tb-MOF-76(NH2)?
questions.answer: Tb-MOF-76(NH2) shows a better performance with a C2H4 productivity of 17.66 L kg-1 compared to 7.53 L kg-1 by Tb-MOF-76.

questions.question: True or False: The introduction of NH2 groups into Tb-MOF-76 decreases the pore size and increases both C2H6 and C2H4 uptakes.
questions.answer: True

questions.question: True or False: Tb-MOF-76(NH2) requires a subsequent desorption process to obtain C2H4 product.
questions.answer: False

questions.question: What is the global production of ethylene mentioned in the text for the year 2021?
questions.answer: Exceeding 210 million tons

questions.question: What is the main challenge in separating C2H6 and C2H4 as described in the text?
questions.answer: The separation is extremely challenging because of similar kinetic diameters and boiling points between C2H6 and C2H4.

questions.question: True or False: The amino-functionalization of Tb-MOF-76 leads to a decrease in its structural stability.
questions.answer: False

questions.question: What is the role of NH2 groups in enhancing the interactions between MOFs and hydrocarbons?
questions.answer: NH2 groups serve as accessible sites to form multiple C-H···N hydrogen bonds with light hydrocarbon molecules to enhance the interactions.

questions.question: True or False: Tb-MOF-76(NH2) has a lower C2H6 uptake at 298 K and 100 kPa compared to Tb-MOF-76.
questions.answer: False

questions.question: How does the C2H6/C2H4 selectivity of Tb-MOF-76(NH2) compare with other C2H6-selective MOFs mentioned?
questions.answer: Tb-MOF-76(NH2) has a selectivity of about 2.1, which is higher than some top-performing C2H6-selective MOFs but lower than benchmark materials like MAF-49.

questions.question: True or False: The amino-functionalization strategy is unique to Tb-MOF-76 and has not been demonstrated by other research groups.
questions.answer: False

questions.question: What is the effect of amino-functionalization on the isosteric heat of adsorption (Qst) for C2H6 and C2H4 in Tb-MOF-76(NH2)?
questions.answer: Amino-functionalization leads to notably higher Qst values in Tb-MOF-76(NH2) for both C2H6 and C2H4 compared to Tb-MOF-76, indicating stronger adsorbate-adsorbent interactions.

questions.question: True or False: The amino-functionalization of Tb-MOF-76 does not affect its pore size distribution.
questions.answer: False

questions.question: What is the main advantage of C2H6-selective adsorbents over C2H4-selective adsorbents for ethylene purification?
questions.answer: C2H6-selective adsorbents preferentially capture C2H6 impurity over C2H4, allowing one-step harvest of C2H4 in a single breakthrough operation process.

questions.question: True or False: The introduction of NH2 groups into Tb-MOF-76 results in a decrease in C2H6/C2H4 selectivity.
questions.answer: False

questions.question: What is the significance of the pore engineering strategy in the development of MOFs for gas separation?
questions.answer: The pore engineering strategy allows for precise design and regulation of the pores of MOFs by modifying linkers with organic groups, improving the separation potential of MOFs.

questions.question: True or False: Tb-MOF-76(NH2) exhibits superior structural stability and recyclability for C2H6/C2H4 separation compared to most reported C2H6-selective MOFs.
questions.answer: True
